display.title: Marina, the Fisherwoman
display.description:
ยง71. Fishing XP Buff: Gain +50 Fishing Wisdom on public islands.
2. Luck of the Sea: Gain +15 Sea Creature Chance.
3. Fishing Festival: Starts a special fishing event during the first 2 days of each month! Fish and fight dangerous Sharks and earn unique Shark loot.
